alert.note: Alert for Butler; Colfax; Cuming; Dodge; Madison; Platte; Saunders; Stanton (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 11 at 1:26AM CDT until July 11 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 AM CDT FOR SOUTHERN MADISON...WESTERN CUMING...COLFAX...PLATTE...WESTERN DODGE...NORTHERN BUTLER...NORTHWESTERN SAUNDERS AND STANTON COUNTIES... At 126 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 2 miles south of Norfolk to near Creston to 3 miles northeast of Monroe, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Norfolk, Columbus, Schuyler, Madison, Stanton, Wisner, Humphrey, Clarkson, Dodge, Howells, Leigh, Pilger, Duncan, Platte Center, Monroe, Lindsay, Creston, Linwood, Richland and Lakeview. People attending Madison County Fairgrounds should seek safe shelter immediately! THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Butler; Colfax; Cuming; Dodge; Madison; Platte; Saunders; Stanton
